languages.text: "Наивное создание... гемункулам Комморры — вроде Тервантьяса, пригретого Иремерисс — по силам выращивать новые тела из небольших кусков плоти, заключенных в амниотические трубки. Любой друкари, сраженный тобой на поле боя, может вновь прийти за тобой. Если душа Иремерисс будет у меня — возможно, ее клон — если он появится — выйдет неполноценным. Быть может, она даже не вспомнит обо мне".

"Naive creature... The Haemonculi of Commorragh — including Tervantias, whom Yremeryss favours — are able to regenerate our slain kin from small pieces of flesh held in amniotic tubes. Any Drukhari you kill on the field of battle can come for you again — albeit at a price, since the Haemonculus claims a portion of their client's soul as payment for this precautionary measure. Perhaps Yremeryss was desperate enough — or insane enough — to resort to such a contract. Who knows, having Yremeryss's soul in my keeping might make her regrown form — if one appears — defective. She might not remember me or you at all."
languages.original_text: "Наивное создание... гемункулам Комморры — вроде Тервантьяса, пригретого Иремерисс — по силам выращивать новые тела из небольших кусков плоти, заключенных в амниотические трубки. Любой друкари, сраженный тобой на поле боя, может вновь прийти за тобой. Если душа Иремерисс будет у меня — возможно, ее клон — если он появится — выйдет неполноценным. Быть может, она даже не вспомнит обо мне".

traits.locale_text: "Naive creature... The Haemonculi of Commorragh — including Tervantias, whom Yremeryss favours — are able to grow new bodies from small pieces of flesh held in amniotic tubes. Any Drukhari you slay on the field of battle can come for you again. But if Yremeryss's soul is in my keeping, perhaps her clone — if one appears — will be defective. Perhaps she will not remember me at all."

"Naive creature... The Haemonculi of Commorragh — including Tervantias, whom Yremeryss favours — are able to grow new bodies from small pieces of flesh held in amniotic tubes. Any Drukhari you slay on the field of battle can come for you again. But if Yremeryss's soul is in my keeping, perhaps her clone — if one appears — will be defective. Perhaps she will not remember me at all."

"Naive creature... The Haemonculi of Commorragh — including Tervantias, whom Yremeryss favours — are able to grow new bodies from small pieces of flesh held in amniotic tubes. Any Drukhari you slay on the field of battle can come for you again. But if Yremeryss's soul is in my keeping, perhaps her clone — if one appears — will be defective. Perhaps she will not remember me at all."

"Naive creature... The Haemonculi of Commorragh — including Tervantias, whom Yremeryss favours — are able to regenerate our slain kin from small pieces of flesh held in amniotic tubes. Any Drukhari you kill on the field of battle can come for you again — albeit at a price, since the Haemonculus claims a portion of their client's soul as payment for this precautionary measure. Perhaps Yremeryss was desperate enough — or insane enough — to resort to such a contract. Who knows, having Yremeryss's soul in my keeping might make her regrown form — if one appears — defective. She might not remember me or you at all."

languages.text: “你真是太天真了……科摩罗的血伶人，包括伊芮梅莉斯最宠爱的特万提亚斯在内，都可以通过羊膜管里的一小块血肉，让死去的黑暗灵族再次复生。你在战场上杀死的每位黑暗灵族，最后都会再次找上门来。不过，复活是有代价的，因为血伶人会拿走他们灵魂的一部分。或许伊芮梅莉斯已经走投无路，又或许是彻底发了疯，才会打算采取这样的手段。如果伊芮梅莉斯的灵魂在我手里，就算真的有人做出了她的克隆体，那也可能是个有缺陷的克隆体。或许，她的克隆体根本不会记得我们两个。”
languages.original_text: "Naive creature... The Haemonculi of Commorragh — including Tervantias, whom Yremeryss favours — are able to regenerate our slain kin from small pieces of flesh held in amniotic tubes. Any Drukhari you kill on the field of battle can come for you again — albeit at a price, since the Haemonculus claims a portion of their client's soul as payment for this precautionary measure. Perhaps Yremeryss was desperate enough — or insane enough — to resort to such a contract. Who knows, having Yremeryss's soul in my keeping might make her regrown form — if one appears — defective. She might not remember me or you at all."

traits.locale_text: “你真是太天真了……科摩罗的血伶人，包括伊芮梅莉斯最宠爱的特万提亚斯在内，都可以通过羊膜管里的一小块血肉，重新培养出新的躯体。你在战场上杀死的每位黑暗灵族，最后都会再次找上门来。不过，如果伊芮梅莉斯的灵魂在我手里，就算真的有人做出了她的克隆体，那也可能是个有缺陷的克隆体。或许，她的克隆体根本不会记得我这个人。”

languages.text: 「無垢な生き物だ…コモラフのハモンキュラス、イレメリスのお気に入りのテルヴァンティアスもそう。羊膜の管に閉じ込めた小さな肉片から、殺された同族は体を取り戻すことができる。戦場で殺したデュカーリは、また目の前に現れる可能性があるのさ — 相当な犠牲を払ってもな。ハモンキュラスは、この予備対策の掛けに依頼主の魂の一部を要求する。おそらくそのような契約に頼るほど、イレメリスはなりふり構っていられなかったか、頭が沸いていたのだな。しかし、イレメリスの魂を閉じ込めておけば、奴が復活して…もし現れたとしても、出来損ないのはずだ。俺やお前を全く覚えていないだろう」
languages.original_text: "Naive creature... The Haemonculi of Commorragh — including Tervantias, whom Yremeryss favours — are able to regenerate our slain kin from small pieces of flesh held in amniotic tubes. Any Drukhari you kill on the field of battle can come for you again — albeit at a price, since the Haemonculus claims a portion of their client's soul as payment for this precautionary measure. Perhaps Yremeryss was desperate enough — or insane enough — to resort to such a contract. Who knows, having Yremeryss's soul in my keeping might make her regrown form — if one appears — defective. She might not remember me or you at all."

traits.locale_text: 「無垢な生き物だ…コモラフのハモンキュラスーーイレメリスのお気に入りのテルヴァンティアスも含めて、羊膜の管に閉じ込めた小さな肉片から、新たな体を育むことができる。戦場で殺したデュカーリはまた目の前に現れる可能性がある。しかし、イレメリスの魂を閉じ込めておけば、奴のクローンがーーもし現れたとしてもーー出来損ないのはずだ。俺を全く覚えていないだろうな」

languages.text: «Criatura ingenua... Los Hemónculos de Commorragh, entre los que se incluye Tervantias, el favorito de Yremeryss, saben cómo regenerar a nuestros parientes muertos a partir de pedazos de carne suspendidos en cubas amnióticas. Cualquier Drukhari al que mates en el campo de batalla puede volver a por ti una vez más... por un precio, ya que el Hemónculo se cobra parte del alma de su cliente como medida cautelar. Tal vez Yremeryss estuviese lo bastante desesperada o loca como para recurrir a semejante contrato. Y quién sabe, tal vez tener en mis manos el alma de Yremeryss haga que su forma regenerada, si es que la hay, sea defectuosa. Tal vez nos haya olvidado a ti y a mí».
languages.original_text: "Naive creature... The Haemonculi of Commorragh — including Tervantias, whom Yremeryss favours — are able to regenerate our slain kin from small pieces of flesh held in amniotic tubes. Any Drukhari you kill on the field of battle can come for you again — albeit at a price, since the Haemonculus claims a portion of their client's soul as payment for this precautionary measure. Perhaps Yremeryss was desperate enough — or insane enough — to resort to such a contract. Who knows, having Yremeryss's soul in my keeping might make her regrown form — if one appears — defective. She might not remember me or you at all."

traits.locale_text: «Criatura ingenua... Los Hemónculos de Commorragh (entre los que se incluye Tervantias, el favorito de Yremeryss) saben cómo cultivar cuerpos nuevos a partir de pedazos de carne suspendidos en cubas amnióticas. Cualquier drukhari al que mates en el campo de batalla puede volver a por ti una vez más. Pero si el alma de Yremeryss obrase en mi poder, su clon (si llegase a aparecer) podría ser defectuoso. Quizá ni siquiera me recuerde».

languages.text: « Sombre ignare... Pour votre gouverne, sachez que les hémoncules de Commorragh – notamment Tervantias, le favori d'Yremeryss – sont capables de régénérer nos défunts congénères à partir de lambeaux de chair conservés dans du liquide amniotique. Ainsi, tous les Drukharis abattus sur le champ de bataille sont susceptibles de revenir à la charge, même s'il y a un prix à payer, car ces créatures prélèvent une partie de l'âme de leur client en guise de paiement pour leurs services. Peut-être Yremeryss était-elle assez désespérée, ou assez folle, pour recourir à un tel contrat. Qui sait, si son âme me revient, peut-être que son nouveau corps, si nouveau corps il y a, sera défectueux. Si ça trouve, elle ne se souviendra même pas de nous. »
languages.original_text: "Naive creature... The Haemonculi of Commorragh — including Tervantias, whom Yremeryss favours — are able to regenerate our slain kin from small pieces of flesh held in amniotic tubes. Any Drukhari you kill on the field of battle can come for you again — albeit at a price, since the Haemonculus claims a portion of their client's soul as payment for this precautionary measure. Perhaps Yremeryss was desperate enough — or insane enough — to resort to such a contract. Who knows, having Yremeryss's soul in my keeping might make her regrown form — if one appears — defective. She might not remember me or you at all."

traits.locale_text: « Sombre ignare... Pour votre gouverne, sachez que les hémoncules de Commorragh – notamment Tervantias, le favori d'Yremeryss – sont capables de régénérer les corps à partir de lambeaux de chair conservés dans du liquide amniotique. Ainsi, tous les Drukhari abattus sur le champ de bataille sont susceptibles de revenir à la charge. Mais si l'âme d'Yremeryss me revient, peut-être que son clone, si clone il y a, sera défaillant. Peut-être ne se souviendra-t-elle même pas de moi. »

languages.text: "Naive Kreatur ... Die Haemonculi von Commorragh – einschließlich Tervantias, dem Yremeryss hold ist – können unsere gefallenen Brüder in Fruchtwasserröhren aus kleinen Fleischklumpen regenerieren. Jeder Drukhari, den ihr auf dem Schlachtfeld tötet, kann zurückkehren ... allerdings zu einem Preis, weil der Haemonculus als Bezahlung für diese Sicherheitsmaßnahme einen Teil der Seele des Kunden verlangt. Vielleicht war Yremeryss verzweifelt oder verrückt genug, sich auf einen solchen Vertrag einzulassen. Wer weiß, nachdem sich Yremeryss' Seele in meiner Obhut befindet, ist ihre nachgewachsene Gestalt – so sie denn erscheint – möglicherweise fehlerhaft. Sie erinnert sich vielleicht gar nicht an mich oder Euch."
languages.original_text: "Naive creature... The Haemonculi of Commorragh — including Tervantias, whom Yremeryss favours — are able to regenerate our slain kin from small pieces of flesh held in amniotic tubes. Any Drukhari you kill on the field of battle can come for you again — albeit at a price, since the Haemonculus claims a portion of their client's soul as payment for this precautionary measure. Perhaps Yremeryss was desperate enough — or insane enough — to resort to such a contract. Who knows, having Yremeryss's soul in my keeping might make her regrown form — if one appears — defective. She might not remember me or you at all."

Jeder Drukhari, den ihr auf dem Schlachtfeld tötet, kann zurückkehren ... allerdings zu einem Preis, weil der Haemonculus als Bezahlung für diese Sicherheitsmaßnahme einen Teil der Seele des Kunden verlangt. Vielleicht war Yremeryss verzweifelt oder verrückt genug, sich auf einen solchen Vertrag einzulassen. Wer weiß, nachdem sich Yremeryss' Seele in meiner Obhut befindet, ist ihre nachgewachsene Gestalt – so sie denn erscheint – möglicherweise fehlerhaft. The Haemonculi of Commorragh — including Tervantias, whom Yremeryss favours — are able to regenerate our slain kin from small pieces of flesh held in amniotic tubes. Any Drukhari you kill on the field of battle can come for you again — albeit at a price, since the Haemonculus claims a portion of their client's soul as payment for this precautionary measure. Perhaps Yremeryss was desperate enough — or insane enough — to resort to such a contract. Who knows, having Yremeryss's soul in my keeping might make her regrown form — if one appears — defective. She might not remember me or you at all."

languages.text: "Seni saf yaratık... Yremeryss'in desteğini alan Tervantias'ın da dâhil olduğu Commorragh Haimonkulusları, öldürülen soydaşlarımızı amniyon tüplerinde tuttukları ufak et parçalarından yeniden bir araya getirebilirler. Savaş alanında öldürdüğün tüm Drukhariler, karşına yeniden çıkabilir. Gerçi bunun bir bedeli var. Haimonkulus, tedbir amaçlı olarak üzerinde çalıştığı herkesin ruhundan bir parçayı ödeme olarak alır. Belki Yremeryss de böylesi bir kontrata sığınacak kadar çaresiz kalmış ya da aklını oynatmıştır. Kim bilir, Yremeryss'in ruhunun elimin altında olması, yeniden ortaya çıkacağı tutarsa onun kusurlu çıkmasını sağlayabilir. Belki beni, hatta seni bile hatırlamayabilir."
languages.original_text: "Naive creature... The Haemonculi of Commorragh — including Tervantias, whom Yremeryss favours — are able to regenerate our slain kin from small pieces of flesh held in amniotic tubes. Any Drukhari you kill on the field of battle can come for you again — albeit at a price, since the Haemonculus claims a portion of their client's soul as payment for this precautionary measure. Perhaps Yremeryss was desperate enough — or insane enough — to resort to such a contract. Who knows, having Yremeryss's soul in my keeping might make her regrown form — if one appears — defective. She might not remember me or you at all."

Savaş alanında öldürdüğün tüm Drukhariler, karşına yeniden çıkabilir. Gerçi bunun bir bedeli var. Haimonkulus, tedbir amaçlı olarak üzerinde çalıştığı herkesin ruhundan bir parçayı ödeme olarak alır.
